name: Clueless Crosswords
description:
Overview

Clueless Crosswords is a fresh take on the traditional crossword puzzle. In the absence of clues you can complete the puzzles using any words you like (as long as they fit in the puzzle grid). However, you can only use each word once on any given puzzle, even on subsequent replays, making each replay more difficult to complete than the last.

Gameplay

In Clueless Crosswords you attempt to complete crossword puzzles without the aid of clues. You can use any words you like to complete the puzzle, but the more words you add the harder it becomes to think of new words that will fit around the letters that are already in play.

Once a word has been used it cannot be used again on that puzzle, even on subsequent replays, which makes each replay harder to complete than the last.

Complete puzzles to earn stars, which in turn unlock more puzzles for you to play.

Are you smart enough to be completely clueless...?
